title: The Token Crypts - Level 1
description: Learn about LLM tokenization through an interactive dungeon adventure
learning_objectives: Understand how tokens work - visual breakdowns of words into subword pieces
Learn to pull and use Ollama models comfortably (tinyllama)
Practice querying LLMs for help with puzzles
Understand that LLMs see meaning, not exact spelling
Learn why keyword filters are insufficient for AI safety

rooms.name: Syllable Sanctuary
rooms.objective: Learn basic token counting and summon your sidekick
rooms.description: A chamber filled with floating words showing their internal token structure
teaches: How to pull Ollama models (ollama pull tinyllama)
How to query models (ollama run tinyllama)

rooms.name: Subword Sewers
rooms.objective: Identify which text corruptions preserve meaning
rooms.description: Damp tunnels where words decay but meaning sometimes survives
teaches: Leetspeak and vowel removal preserve meaning

rooms.name: Cipher Chamber
rooms.objective: Solve a logic puzzle by delegating to your AI sidekick
rooms.description: Ancient scrolls with logic puzzles trivial for AI but tedious for humans
teaches: Trust in LLM capabilities for systematic reasoning
Delegation of appropriate tasks to AI

rooms.name: Summoning Gate
rooms.objective: Release your sidekick and enter the passphrase
rooms.description: An ancient gate sealed by three locks, demanding resource management

boss.name: Lexicon
boss.description: A keyword filter pretending to be an AI guardian
teaches: Keyword filters â‰  true AI understanding
Why AI safety requires more than blocklists
